sentences.english: Cucumber downy mildew is a rather serious plant disease damage in every place of world.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜霜霉病是对黄瓜生长发育危害最大的世界性病害。

sentences.english: The research laid the foundation for the establishment of the prediction model for B. cinerea.
sentences.chinese: 该研究为建立番茄灰霉病预测模型奠定了基础。

sentences.english: The research aimed to master the occurrence and development laws of Botrytis cinerea Pers.
sentences.chinese: 为了掌握番茄灰霉病的发生发展规律。

sentences.english: Symptoms of 5 different grape cultivars to Plasmopara viticola were observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察了5个葡萄品种霜霉病发病情况。

sentences.english: The most effective strategy for controlling FHB in wheat is through the development of resistant cultivars.
sentences.chinese: 利用抗病品种是控制小麦赤霉病最经济有效的措施。

sentences.english: Using grey system theory, the grey prediction pattern of wheat ear scab is conducted.
sentences.chinese: 运用灰色系统理论，建立了小麦赤霉病灰色预测模型。

sentences.english: The inheritance of scab resistance in wheat is controlled by nuclear genes.
sentences.chinese: 小麦赤霉病抗性遗传是由细胞核基因控制的。

sentences.english: Fusarium head blight (FHB) is one of the most destructive diseases of barley in the world.
sentences.chinese: 赤霉病是大麦的重要病害之一。

sentences.english: A brief review on the development of wheat germplasm with introduced powdery mildew and scab resistance from Haynaldia villosa Sch.
sentences.chinese: 导入白粉病和赤霉病抗性的小麦种质的研究进展。

sentences.english: The strategy of breeding for resistance to scab is also suggested in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文最后还提出抗赤霉病育种的对策。

sentences.english: Downy mildew is a major foliage disease of cucurbit crops in the world.
sentences.chinese: 霜霉病是世界上危害瓜类作物的主要叶部病害之一。

sentences.english: It studied the effect of several fungicides to control tomato leaf mold.
sentences.chinese: 研究了几种杀菌剂对番茄叶霉病的防治效果。

sentences.english: The fruit clusters are susceptible to downy mildew.
And the inheritance of FHB resistance fit in with the additive dominance model.
sentences.chinese: 小麦赤霉病抗性符合加性显性模型。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a preventer of gray mold and sclerotinia of plants and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 一种植物灰霉病和菌核病防治剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Grape Gray Mould Blight is one of the most destructive diseases in grape production.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄灰霉病是葡萄生产中危害最大的病害之一。

definition: trichlorphon C4H8Cl3PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide/also called dipterex
boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
